backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing role-based access control, user profiles, and product catalog with create/delete and vendor tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a branding update task and its related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing styling, hooks, components, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the app title and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setting up auth state, profile modal, admin/vendor portals, hero section, and product grid within a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Admin interface providing tabs for managing products and adding new ones.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Admin product table with loading states, availability toggles, delete actions, and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/ConfirmDia: Reusable alert dialog for confirming destructive actions with optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component that collects product details and submits them via createProduct mutation. Handles validation, success/error toasts, and form reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity that manages auth flow, error handling, and dynamic button text/icons.
frontend/src/components/auth/ModeSelecto: Provides customer/vendor mode switching using tab controls tied to auth mode state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/brand/Logo.tsx: Renders the MyLocal Kart logo image and brand text.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays the app footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai including tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, role badges, mode selector, and login button, adapting to authentication state.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Produ: Displays a product with image, price, unit label, description, and stock status indicators.
Fetches and displays available or all products (for admins), with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Store: Hero section with promotional text, animated highlights, and a hero image for the storefront.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPor: Vendor dashboard with tabs for managing existing products and adding new ones.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: A form component for vendors to create products, handling validation, price conversion, and submission via a createProduct mutation.
Displays a vendor’s products with loading and error states, allowing availability toggling and deletion with confirmation.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useAuthMode.ts: Manages and persists the user's auth mode (customer or vendor) in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor, with loading state tied to actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Retrieves the caller’s role and exposes convenience booleans for role checks and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveProfile.t: Mutation hook to save the caller’s profile and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains product-related queries and mutations, including fetching, creating, deleting, and toggling availability.
frontend/src/hooks/vendor/useVendorProdu: Fetches products for the authenticated vendor using their principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables plus custom utility classes like glass effects and neon glow.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugin setup for the app’s futuristic UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features for the MyLocal Kart app.
